To satisfy the conditions for this challenge, you should:

+ Select a data set from either [TidyTuesdays](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday) or [MakeoverMonday](https://www.makeovermonday.co.uk/data/).

+ Use either RShiny or Tableau to create a dynamic dashboard that includes two or more graphs and at least one key summary statistic. Tell a story with the data!

+ Submit your dashboard to Canvas.
